mapper.sql: employee_id, account, pwd, phone, `NAME`, create_time, `STATUS`, role_id, head_img
mapper.insert: insert into tb_employee (account, pwd, phone, `NAME`, create_time, `STATUS`, role_id, head_img ) values #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password(#{pwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{role.roleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{headImg.imgId,jdbcType=INTEGER} )

insert into tb_employee
account,
pwd,
phone,
`NAME`,
create_time,
`STATUS`,
role_id,
head_img,

mapper.update:
update tb_employee
account = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pwd = password(#{pwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
`NAME` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
`STATUS` = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
role_id = #{role.roleId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
head_img = #{headImg.imgId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where employee_id = #{employeeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tb_employee set account = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pwd = password(#{pwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `NAME` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, `STATUS` = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, role_id = #{role.roleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, head_img = #{headImg.imgId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where employee_id = #{employeeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from tb_employee where account = #{account} and pwd=password(#{pwd})
